title: Mike Doughty - Yes And Also Yes (2011)
description:
Mike Doughty - Yes and Also Yes (2011)

A phenomenal new album by Mike Doughty. Take a listen and if you dig it, buy a copy and help Mike out! This one\\\\\\\'s a keeper for sure...check out the review, enjoy, comment and above all, SEED!!!!!

Wndrngpoet

Prior to the release of his fourth studio album, ex-Soul Coughing frontman Mike Doughty sent out a press release that highlighted some key points concerning Yes and Also Yes\\\\\\\' creation.
